Cremation Sites of Indian Leaders:
Cremation Sites of Indian Leaders

LeaderCremation SiteLocationNotes / Meaning of Name

Mahatma GandhiRaj GhatNear Yamuna River"Raj Ghat" means "King's Bank"
Jawaharlal NehruShanti VanAdjacent to Raj Ghat"Forest of Peace"
Indira GandhiShakti SthalNear Raj Ghat"Place of Power"
Rajiv GandhiVeer BhumiNear Raj Ghat"Land of the Brave"
Lal Bahadur ShastriVijay GhatNear Raj Ghat"Victory Bank"
Morarji DesaiAbhay GhatNear Raj Ghat"Fearless Bank"
Charan SinghKisan GhatNear Raj Ghat"Farmer's Bank"
Jagjivan RamSamta SthalNear Raj Ghat"Place of Equality"
Giani Zail SinghEkta SthalNear Raj Ghat"Place of Unity"
Atal Bihari VajpayeeSadaiv AtalNear Raj Ghat"Always Firm" / "Forever Steadfast"
Dr. A. P. J. Abdul KalamRameswaram, Tamil NaduPei Karumbu, RameswaramHe was buried, not cremated (Muslim tradition)
